nodes.text: During the rule of the Galactic Empire, King of Mon Cala Lee-Char maintained a palace in Dac City on the Outer Rim world Mon Cala. The palace was a target by the Inquisitorius during the Battle of Dac City, and, along with Dac City and the rest of the surface cities, was destroyed by enormous sea creatures.
The palace in Dac City debuted in the 2018 canon comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 13, written by Charles Soule and pencilled Giuseppe Camuncoli.
